title: Cuban Ropa Vieja
ingredients: 1  green bell pepper, seeded and sliced into strips
method: Step 1: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add flank steak and cook until browned, about 4 minutes per side.
Step 2: Transfer steak to a slow cooker; pour in beef broth and tomato sauce. Add tomato paste, bell pepper, onion, garlic, cumin, cilantro, olive oil, and vinegar; stir until well blended.
Step 3: Cover and cook on Low for up to 10 hours, or on High for 4 hours.
Step 4: Shred steak in the slow cooker with two forks.
